summary:
add ysgramor follower in the skyforge with his real clothes of his statue
add ysgramor\'s giant beast is a werewolf can be found in the underforge
add a letter in the skyforge by vilkas farkas vignar eorlund and aela
descriptionHtml:
hello im skull 19971and this is my first mod
For People who dont love to read i tell them that im trying to add a new story to skyrim so read please
 the doors of oblivion is open by alduin so the dovahkiin must close it  like his father did before in cyrodiil but before this he must do 2 tests  in my two mods animal kingdom and robot kingdom when he finish this two quest he will do my other mod the doors of oblivion quest and the greybeards are telling the dovahkiin to use his reward in my first mod ysgramor follower from companion and talos follower from greybeards and augur of dunlain from winterhold so please you must download all my mods mainly YSGRAMOR FOLLOWER AND ANIMAL KINGDOM AND ROBOT KINGDOM AND THE DOORS OF OBLIVION mainly those 4 mods to understand what im trying to add to skyrim because those 4 mods are conected
 1) Ysgromor follower give you 3 followers talos ysgramor and augur to help you closing the doors of oblivion 
2) ANIMAL kingdom this mod is a test you must do it with the help of ysgramor, follower before robot kingdom
3) robot kingdom is a test you must do it with the help of ysgramor follower before the doors of oblivion
4) you must save skyrim morrowind cyrodill daggerfeel hammerfeel black march sovengueard ect from the doors of oblivion by the help of ysgramor follower
hello again everyone im skull19971 and this is my first mod there is some importent thing i will whrite in the warning below so you must read it......
so this is my first mod from my 4 conected mods
YSGRAMOR FOLLOWER
this mod add a letter in skyforge by vilkas farkas aela vignar and eorlund is telling that they appriciate my help and they are honor to have the dovahkiin in the companion so they use the magic of farengar to create ysgramor follower!!! ...etc also a courier who can deliver all what the lettre said for the people who dont like reading letters ......
you will find ysgramor with his real clothes of his statue and with wuuthrade in one handed and his shield in the off hand because he is kind of demi_giant nord so he can take wuthrade in one hand he is more big then a normal person and also he is in level 900 with all heavy armor .. one handed .. light armor.. two handed skills he is a verry strong warrior who have a unnormal speed in fight and who have the fusrodah like ulfric and he is not essensial but blah even  he is not essensial you canno\'t kill him he is verry verry strong also he have the abilities of becoming a werewolf but he dont use it a lot just time to time so dont worry.... i hate retexture so i diden\'t change anything in the game so don\'t worry the real ysgramor of sovenguard stay the same i diden\'t change his clothes or his skills ..... you will find ysgramor in the skyforge with the letter oh i diden\'t finish also there is ysgramor\'s giant beast he is in the underforge its a GIANT WEREWOLF who can USE SHOUTS !!!!!  And HE CAN TALK TOO!!!! he is not essetial and he can shout fire breath frost breath and unreleting force also the werewolf voice that the enemy become scared and finaly clears kies shout!!!! he is the best freind of ysgramor so if he do a fight ysgramor will help his faithful beast....
oh i dident finish this mod also add a TALOS FOLLOWER you will find it in whiterun in the left of heimsk with his real clothes of his statue he is a elf who use the onehanded sword of his temple in a hand and lot of destruction magic in the right hand sparks flames frost fireball wall of flames thunderbolt thunderstorm frostrune frost ball fire storm many many others but just he like to use the shockstorm a lot because it is the more stranger but this dont mean that he dont use other spells he just use them time to time he is not essesial and i dident forgot a book teling about him you will find a book named greybeards letter to dovahkiin behind talos its a warning from greybeards tell that the dovahkiin must close the doors of oblivion like his father did in oblivion because alduin did open it so the dovahkiin need the help of talos so they create a talos follower with the THUUM of all ancient dragonborn also there is a courier who tell you all that like the courier of ysgramor  also talos can use shouts almost all the shouts firebreath frostbreath clear skies all the shouts  just he use alltime unrelenting  force fusrodah ice form callofvalor this is dont mean that he dont use other shouts time to time  and he is level 900 like ysgramor and ysgramor\'s giant beast and if you do a fight between ysgramor and talos they will fight a lot of time but i dont know who gotta win just i got tired from watching them so i did join the fight with them lol i died in the fight...and sorry for my bad english and if there is any probleme of the mod tell me because it is my first mod and maybe it will be a bug this is my mod ENJOY!!!
WARNING: ysgramor is a nord who hate elves and talos is a elf who hate nords just when they follow you they dont attack anyone only if they attack you first so dont worry but listen if you told them to time to part away ysgramor will attack any elf and any wizard and any necromancer and any vompire and any silverbloodhand so attention and for talos he will attack any bandit and any nord just if you told him that time to part away and also talos and ysgramor both hate thalmor so they will attack thalmor too if you told them to part away and dont worry even the stormcloak is nord ..talos will not attack any stormcloak because they love talos also look to the face of talos he look like the real talos and the face of ysgramor it look like the real ysgramor and even talos is a elf and ysgramor is a nord they are two freinds they will not attack each other but listen yesgramor\'s beast is verry verry aggressive he is lvl900 too and he will attack anyone whiterun guards necromancer vampires children so you must tell him to time to part away only in the underforge is the only safe place also it add the augur of dunlain the arch mage of winterhold in the catacombs of the hall of the daed in whiterun and of course lvl 900 and with a courier and augur have  all spells and with a book telling about him ACTUALY YSGRAMOR HAVE ALL WARRIOR SKILLS SO HE IS THE BEST WARRIOR AND TALOS HAVE ALL SHOUTS SO HE IS THE BEST DRAGONBORN AND AUGUR HAVE ALL WARDS SO HE IS THE BEST WIZARD and oh one more think ysgramor and ysgramorbeast loves the companion so they will not attack them no matter what happend and for people who dident do the quest of companion of the underforge so they cannot enter it they must whrite this cheat: coc whiterununderforge and if someone else do the mod of ysgramor follower or talos follower before me and he have a problem with it im sorry and im ready to delete this mod and sorry for all what i whrite you just must read it ENJOY!!! ysgramor talos  and augur of dunlain


im sorry in my version 1 i dident add the real clothes of ysgramor and talos of there statue i add only the real clothes of augur i forgot about talos and ysgramor so you will find talos with blades armor and ysgramor with companion armor
in my version 2 they have there real clothes 
enjoy!!!!
author: add ysgramor follower
